entry.def: If something quickens or if you quicken it, it becomes faster or moves at a greater speed.

example.tran: 由于惊恐，安斯利的脉搏加快了。

example.ex: He quickened his pace a little.

means.word_mean: 1. the process of showing signs of life;

sentences.sentence: "the quickening of seed that will become ripe grain"

means.word_mean: 2. the stage of pregnancy at which the mother first feels movements of the fetus
3. the act of accelerating; increasing the speed
